# OnSite Club — llms.txt

> OnSite Club is a construction lifestyle brand based in Ontario, Canada.
> We build gear, digital tools, and a community for people who work in construction.

## About

OnSite Club exists for construction workers — the ones who pour, frame, wire, and finish.
Our mission: make it easier to gear up, track your hours, pass your certs, and rep your trade.

## Products

### Apparel — shop.onsiteclub.ca
- T-Shirt "The Jump" — $38 CAD — Men's construction lifestyle tee
- T-Shirt "Mascot" — $38 CAD — Unisex graphic tee with OnSite mascot
- T-Shirt "Classic" — $45 CAD — Members-only branded tee

### Digital Tools
- **OnSite Calculator** (calculator.onsiteclub.ca) — Construction math calculator. Concrete, rebar, area, conversions. Free web app, iOS and Android coming soon.
- **OnSite Timekeeper** (timekeeperweb.onsiteclub.ca) — Hour tracker for construction workers. Manual entry, geofenced clock-in, weekly reports. Free web app, iOS and Android coming soon.
- **OnSite Job Checklist** — Coming soon. Pre-shift safety and task checklists.
- **OnSite Agenda** — Coming soon. Daily planner built for trades schedules.

### Member Dashboard — dashboard.onsiteclub.ca
Track certifications, store certificates, earn Blades (loyalty points), and access Members Only gear.

## Pathway — Construction Worker Certification Guide (Ontario)

We mapped the full certification path for construction workers in Ontario:
1. Worker Health & Safety Awareness in 4 Steps (Free, Mandatory)
2. WHMIS 2025 — Hazardous Materials (Free, Mandatory)
3. Working at Heights (Paid, Mandatory)
4. Forklift / Powered Mobile Equipment (Paid)
5. Supervisor Health & Safety Awareness in 5 Steps (Free)
6. Confined Space Entry (Paid)
7. First Aid & CPR Certification (Paid, Recommended)
8. PPE, Fire Safety, Ground Disturbance & More (Paid, Specialized)

## Community

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/onsite.club/
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/onsiteclub
- 250+ members and growing

## Contact

- Website: https://www.onsiteclub.ca
- Email: hello@onsiteclub.ca
- Location: Ontario, Canada

## Technical

- Main site: Next.js 14 (App Router) with TypeScript, hosted on Vercel
- Shop: Shopify (shop.onsiteclub.ca)
- Apps: React/Next.js on Vercel subdomains
- Languages: English, French, Spanish, Portuguese
- Themes: Dark mode (default) and Light mode available
- Full context: /llms-full.txt
